data.title: Legislator Details
data.text:
Vital Records Information:

Marital Information:

married James E. Byrum; children: Barbara Anne, James Richard.

Number of Children: 2

Background

Education:

AA, Lansing Community College BS cum laude, Michigan State University

Biographical Sketch:

Daughter of Cecil Dershem & Mary Dershem. Owner of Blackhawk Hardware, Leslie, MI, 1983—, Panther Hardware, Stockbridge, 1991— . Member Michigan Retail Hardware Association, Lansing Regional C. of C., South Lansing Business Association, South Lansing-Everett Kiwanis. Recipient Distinguished Citizen award Ingham County Soil Conservation District, 1991, Distinguished Alumnus award Lansing Community College, 1993. 8 year Ingham County Commissioner.

Notable Facts:

First woman to run a MI legislative caucus. Committees: Minority vice chair Agriculture & Forestry; Health Policy; & Senior Citizens; member Tech. & Energy, Capitol; chair dem. caucus. Mother of Rep. Barb Byrum

Sessions Served:

Bibliography:

WWAM50th; MICAP flier 1997; Manual 1999 p.143; Capitol2005 p.35
